review.reviewBody: The mango sticky rice was unreal! Not too sweet, delicious fresh mango and I dont know how you made it vegan but still so creamy. 12/10!
Love the milk tea ice cream...and mango sticky rice!!
Phenomenal flavours, I always have a hard time choosing because everything is so amazing. Highly recommend!
